section.name: Merlin Kernel
section.p: Merlin separates the concepts of Kernel and Container. A kernel manages resources (Objects) whereas a container manages services. Merlin provides a default kernel that manages a container hierarchy: DefaultKernel. It handles overall management, including startup, shutdown, extension management, and other system-wide tasks.

The kernel provides a set of bootstrap services (like a logging service) and context entries to the (root) container it is managing. It subsequently publishes established entries and services (derived from container deployment) towards kernel clients.
